nodes.text: Precht was a Human male trooper recruit in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. At some point following the Alliance's formation, Precht had recently become a member, and was a rookie Rebel trooper aboard the CR90 corvette Tantive IV. He excelled in planetside security missions while trying to impress the vessel's Captain, Raymus Antilles. Precht was a fair-skinned man. During his time aboard the Tantive IV, he wore the typical Alliance Fleet trooper uniform. He hoped to make a good impression with Captain Antilles and his crew. Precht was armed with a DH-17 blaster pistol.
Precht was first featured on a card for the Premiere edition of Decipher, Inc.'s 2001 Jedi Knights Trading Card Game.
